app.title: RaceChrono Lap Comparison Tool
app.subtitle: Compare lap data from RaceChrono Pro. Upload multiple CSV files to analyze.

sidebar.upload_help: Select one or more CSV files exported from RaceChrono Pro (CSV3 format)
sidebar.track_config_help: Select track for accurate corner detection

tips.fastest_reference: Fastest lap is used as reference

app.upload_prompt: Upload CSV files from the sidebar to get started.

export_guide.title: How to export from RaceChrono Pro
export_guide.step6: 6. Include channels: GPS, Accelerometer, and OBD (if available)

corners.no_corners: No corners detected. Check lateral acceleration data.

bottleneck.no_bottlenecks: No significant bottlenecks detected (threshold: {threshold} km/h difference)
bottleneck.potential_summary: Improve the **{count}** bottleneck areas above to gain **{time}** per lap!

descriptions.brake_later: Later braking point, carrying {diff:.1f} km/h more into corner
descriptions.brake_earlier: Earlier braking, {diff:.1f} km/h slower at turn-in
descriptions.corner_slower: Lower corner speed, losing {diff:.1f} km/h through corner
descriptions.exit_slower: Slower exit, losing {diff:.1f} km/h on acceleration

coach.no_issues: Great job! No significant areas for improvement detected.

brake_early.suggestion: Try braking {distance:.0f}m later, build up progressively

apex_slow.suggestion: Check line selection or carry more entry speed

exit_slow.suggestion: Get on throttle earlier after apex

lateral_g_low.suggestion: More grip available, commit harder to corner

top_speed_low.suggestion: Improve previous corner exit for better straightaway speed

technique.no_insights: Upload more laps or ensure data quality for detailed insights.

grip_low.title: {name}: Low grip utilization
grip_low.description: Only {pct:.1f}% of lap at >0.8G combined. The tires have more grip available. Consider carrying more speed or braking later.

trail_brake.title: {name}: Trail braking opportunity
trail_brake.description: Trail braking detected in only {pct:.0f}% of corners. Maintaining brake pressure into corner entry can help rotate the car and improve lap time.

throttle_delayed.title: {name}: Delayed throttle in corner {corner}
throttle_delayed.description: Full throttle reached {dist:.0f}m after apex. Earlier throttle application (if traction allows) could improve exit speed.

braking_key.title: Braking is a key area for improvement
braking_key.description: Approximately {time:.0f}ms lost in braking zones. Focus on braking later and trail braking into corners.

corner_speed_key.title: Corner speed needs improvement
corner_speed_key.description: Approximately {time:.0f}ms lost in corners. Consider a wider line or more confidence through mid-corner.

exit_accel_key.title: Exit acceleration is losing time
exit_accel_key.description: Approximately {time:.0f}ms lost on corner exits. Focus on getting on throttle earlier and maximizing traction.

consistency.title: Lap time variation detected
consistency.description: Lap times vary by {cv:.1f}% (std dev: {std:.2f}s). Focus on repeating the techniques from your fastest lap.

line_consistency.title: Line inconsistency at {location}
line_consistency.description: Lateral deviation of {deviation:.1f}m from reference line. Focus on hitting the same apex point.

throttle_smoothness.title: Throttle oscillation at {location}
throttle_smoothness.description: Throttle input shows {oscillations} on/off cycles. Smoother throttle application improves traction.

settings.sensitivity_help: Lower = stricter detection, Higher = more lenient

footer.title: RaceChrono Lap Comparison Tool
footer.tip_focus: Focus on the biggest bottlenecks first
footer.tip_compare: Compare your best lap against previous attempts

hints.throttle_low: Can be more aggressive on exit

gg_analysis.right_weak: Right ({right:.2f}G) vs Left ({left:.2f}G) â†’ Right turns conservative, can improve by {diff:.2f}G
gg_analysis.left_weak: Left ({left:.2f}G) vs Right ({right:.2f}G) â†’ Left turns conservative, can improve by {diff:.2f}G
